title: The apostle Paul wrote: "Do not be afraid of me, but I will not be afraid of you. "
subtitle: United States President Donald Trump's supporters participated with joy in an article in social media that suggested that the removal of the President could be surprisingly counterproductive.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: It was a newspaper article on the consequences of the exact isolation of United States President Donald Trump, written by Herm F. "Pepperfly pills"
